DOC.brief_summary: This study examines Limited versus extended pelvic lymphadenectomy.
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Study to Compare a Limited Versus Extended Pelvic Lymphadenectomy During Prostatectomy
DOC.detailed_description: This study is meant to show if the extension of lymphadenectomy during prostatectomy has an influence of outcome of patients. Patients with indication to prostatectomy due to prostate cancer will be included. Both extensions of lymphadenectomy are used in hospitals as a free choice. This study shell show if one method is more effective than the other.
